metadata.description: OpenCLAW Quick Start - Deploy with pre-configured messaging channel
Pre-configure a messaging channel (Telegram is easiest - just need a bot token from @BotFather)
Telegram bot token from @BotFather (required if messagingChannel is 'telegram')
Discord bot token (required if messagingChannel is 'discord')
Anthropic API key (recommended - get from console.anthropic.com)

variables.setupScript:
[base64(concat('#!/bin/bash
set -e
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
echo "[$(date)] Starting OpenCLAW Quick Start setup..." | tee /var/log/openclaw-setup.log

# Install Node.js 22
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | bash - >> /var/log/openclaw-setup.log 2>&1
apt-get install -y nodejs >> /var/log/openclaw-setup.log 2>&1
echo "[$(date)] Node.js installed: $(node --version)" | tee -a /var/log/openclaw-setup.log

# Install OpenCLAW
npm install -g clawdbot >> /var/log/openclaw-setup.log 2>&1
echo "[$(date)] OpenCLAW installed: $(clawdbot --version)" | tee -a /var/log/openclaw-setup.log

# Create directories
mkdir -p /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/clawd
mkdir -p /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot

# Create config with channel
cat > /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot/clawdbot.json << ''CONFIGEOF''
{"gateway":{"mode":"local","port":18789,"bind":"lan","auth":{"mode":"token","token":"', variables('gatewayToken'), '"}},"agents":{"defaults":{"workspace":"/home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/clawd"}}', variables('channelConfig'), '}
CONFIGEOF

# Create environment file for API keys
cat > /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot/env << ''ENVEOF''
', variables('anthropicEnv'), variables('openaiEnv'), 'ENVEOF

# Create systemd service with env file
cat > /etc/systemd/system/openclaw.service << ''SERVICEEOF''
[Unit]
Description=OpenCLAW Gateway
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=simple
User=', parameters('adminUsername'), '
WorkingDirectory=/home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/clawd
EnvironmentFile=-/home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot/env
Environment=NODE_ENV=production
ExecStart=/usr/bin/clawdbot gateway
Restart=always
RestartSec=10
StandardOutput=journal
StandardError=journal

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
SERVICEEOF

# Set permissions
chown -R ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), ' /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/clawd
chown -R ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), ' /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot
chmod 600 /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot/clawdbot.json
chmod 600 /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/.clawdbot/env

# Enable and start service
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable openclaw
systemctl start openclaw

# Create info file
PUBLIC_IP=$(curl -s ifconfig.me)
CHANNEL_INFO="', if(equals(parameters('messagingChannel'), 'telegram'), 'Telegram: Bot will auto-connect! DM your bot to start chatting.', if(equals(parameters('messagingChannel'), 'discord'), 'Discord: Bot will auto-connect! Invite it to your server and DM or mention it.', 'No channel configured. Add one via the Control UI.')), '"
cat > /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/OPENCLAW_INFO.txt << EOF
=====================================
  OpenCLAW Quick Start Complete!
=====================================

Control UI: http://${PUBLIC_IP}:18789
Gateway Token: ', variables('gatewayToken'), '

Messaging Channel: ', parameters('messagingChannel'), '
${CHANNEL_INFO}

SSH: ssh ', parameters('adminUsername'), '@$(hostname -f)

Service Commands:
  sudo systemctl status openclaw
  sudo systemctl restart openclaw
  sudo journalctl -u openclaw -f

Docs: https://docs.clawd.bot
=====================================
EOF
chown ', parameters('adminUsername'), ':', parameters('adminUsername'), ' /home/', parameters('adminUsername'), '/OPENCLAW_INFO.txt

echo "[$(date)] OpenCLAW Quick Start setup complete!" | tee -a /var/log/openclaw-setup.log
echo "[$(date)] Channel: ', parameters('messagingChannel'), '" | tee -a /var/log/openclaw-setup.log
'))]

nextSteps.value: [if(equals(parameters('messagingChannel'), 'telegram'), 'Your Telegram bot is ready! Send a message to your bot to start chatting.', if(equals(parameters('messagingChannel'), 'discord'), 'Your Discord bot is ready! Invite it to your server and DM or @mention it.', 'Open the Control UI and configure your API keys and messaging channels.'))]
